title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: When switching perspectives, the CVS repository view loses its maximized state.
EB: The CVS repository view should remain maximized even after switching perspectives.
SR:
1. Open the application and navigate to the CVS repository view.
2. Maximize the view.
3. Switch to another perspective.
4. Return to the original perspective.

Expected Result: The CVS repository view should still be maximized.
